title: When you give your midlane blue buff

replies.body: {{champion:77}}: http://media1.giphy.com/media/GaiXm1EOHlgek/giphy.gif
Udyr got a new spirit. The spirit of Urf the manatee.
He actually has that in his Ultimate skin >.>
Midlaners man...
{{champion:98}} But {{champion:236}} I {{champion:51}} never {{champion:127}} ordered {{champion:101}} a {{champion:85}} blue.

Don't Lucian, Lissandra, and Xerath still adore blue buff? And Caitlyn is rather mana hungry if she wants to poke, and Kennen and Shen have high energy costs, so it's really not a bad thing to give them either.
I don't know many champs that *can't* use blue buff. But they don't need it. And they don't get nearly as much out of it as other mids.
Hey I'm a nice mid laner!
I don't deny your kind exist.  Like non-toxic adc's and other stereotypes.
I especially love when an 0/4 midlaner curses me out for not giving them blue, sorry but I would rather not give our blue buff to the enemy Fizz thank you very much

I was anivia mid

And we had a nunu jungle

I never got a blue or asked for one

Why?

I run a full mana regen rune page 

I won lane hard ending laning with 50 more CS and being 1/0/3 (nunu ganked to take the kills but o/w)

Ended the game with more kills and assists with still having 0 deaths

It's all about who your mid is, ps I main support

Edit: changed kid to mid, stupid auto correct

As an Anivia player (or midlane overall) never expect to get the blue, just play by yourself and i always win with Anivia, also i dont recomend mana regen runes... i dont have problems once i get Tear and Catalyst riot buffed her mana costs a lot

> [{quoted}](name=Mestm97,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=i6tF8qJn,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-11-27T17:04:45.818+0000)
>
> As an Anivia player (or midlane overall) never expect to get the blue, just play by yourself and i always win with Anivia, also i dont recomend mana regen runes... i dont have problems once i get Tear and Catalyst riot buffed her mana costs a lot

With a full mana regen page the only mana item I need to make is RoA, resulting in more damage item late game

I get to bypass buying tear because of it and I end up with more AP mid game and that results in more early snowballing for a stronger late game

And if I am loosing lane, I can farm with spells more to make sure my tower doesn't fall, and if this is the case I build 2 mana items instead of 1 and I end up being able to spam all day to laugh off siege attempts as the minions won't get to tower

The full mana regen might make my early damage a little lower, but it makes my mid game stronger and laning phase safer,   Each tune page has its own perks. I prefer the one that lets me survive lane if I'm losing while still helping me fight with having more mana regen

Ps I use the AP pr lvl Reds because the red mana regen runes are 100% not worth it

Could work, if it works for you is alright, but with RoA and Seraph you get a massive amount of AP, usually my core items are those 2 and Liandry's so i just melt everyone really fast and i take armor and magic resist per level runes, and AP Quints, i can manage o survive early and late im really strong and somewhat tanky with so much health and Seraph shield im not that squishy, but Giant slayer item fuck me pretty hard hahaha.

This post gave me blue balls.

Wait, junglers can give blue buff?
I thought they just farmed to late game.

Curse you jungler, you lied to me!
/s

i don't really ask for blue buffs i just buy mana pots -oh wait......
Lmao
I think all junglers can relate to this event when you give blue to your mid laner and they just suddenly die moments after, giving it to the enemy... -_-

Double {{item:1056}} is good enough for most of the mids i play.
Blue buff is a luxury.

Heh... My first 3 items as Zilean: {{item:1082}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3010}} 
I'm never oom ever after that...
This is only an issue in low elo where people are completely focused on everyone elses play rather than focused on their own.
It isnt an issue, it is a joke.
I love when people bitch at me for gank and blue buff. If they complain I just afk farm jungle then shoe up to team fights fucking super sayian mode
Every Udyr ever ~2015

I main mid. I don't really ask for blue buff. I only take blue buff if I can solo it . But I question some junglers who are manaless (rengar , reksai, etc.) Always take blue buff all game. CD is nice but I mean just give it to your mid lane or even adc lol.
If I'm trying to snowball as Rengar I will GLADLY take blue unless I have a 2/0 lane that can roam on it better than I can.
Sooooo upvoted.
Oh my God I haven't laughed this hard in a while. Thanks OP. Take this upvote
Its funny when mid takes red and then he asks for blue regardless.
I think we all know how fed Ahri is in the second panel, so she doesn't even need blue **or** a gank
